body.p:
Marion Ky June 9th 1861
Beriah Magoffin Governor of Ky
Frankfort Kentucky
Dear Sir

At the last Term of the Crittenden Circuit Court a Judgement was Rendered by said court against D A Butler for $500 and against J S Lowery for the sum of $500 and against W B Travis for the sum of $250. I think that said Judgements are Exorbitant and that executive interferance would meet the approbation of the citizens of this county I have known the defendants for many years and have found them to be law abiding men and the offence of which they were charged was for assault and Battery

I am Yours truly
Berry. S. Young

Crittenden Cir. Ct
$500 D A Butler
$500 J. S. Lowery
$250 W. B Travis
Remitted as to one half of Judgt issd respite 6 mos as to balance
